title: [Question] How do I proceed with only one preference and nothing else? (branch change)
content:
https://preview.redd.it/nfx43jou14if1.png?width=888&format=png&auto=webp&s=4a92a38a50e8258f450928ab03266a37fd1e6b5c

Hey, I'm trying to apply for campus change.

I'm currently in ec cs and don't want anything else apart from rr cs. But the page isn't allowing me to proceed with it. Any solution please?

comments.body: Put either the same thing thrice or put 3 of whatever u want. Regardless if you dont get first one say you have to say pass when they call ur name in counseling (but if u try to change later bro will scream at u) .
What's your approx. cgpa, if you don't mind?
Is it something like do we need to pay extra money to garb the seat??

U only pay money if u are shifting from a lower fee to higher fee course like ece to cse u need to pay the difference. Also if you are shifting you need to pay 5k to shift branch and 5k for campus 10k Total if both.
